commit_scope: Add friction-category awareness and unblock-queue learning to self-improvement flow, including category API coverage and prompt-level friction prioritization guidance.

commands: cd api && ruff check app/models/friction.py app/routers/friction.py app/services/friction_service.py scripts/run_self_improve_cycle.py tests/test_friction_api.py tests/test_run_self_improve_cycle.py

phase_gate.blocked_reason: Awaiting commit/push, PR checks, and production deploy verification.

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: Self-improve planning uses friction-category evidence and unblock/ROI queue awareness to prioritize high-impact, spec-first unblocks and reduce repeated friction loops.
test_flows: Call /api/friction/categories and confirm grouped categories include friction, monitor, failed-tasks, and github-actions when source evidence exists.
Run self-improve cycle and confirm plan direction includes friction-category focus plus flow_unblock/roi_queue guidance lines.
Confirm run reports include friction_category_count and awareness_gap_count in input bundle summary and delta proof.
